verbs.description: [ARG0: Covfefe] [V: took] over [ARG1: social media] [ARGM-TMP: on May 31 , 2017] [ARGM-TMP: after Donald Trump used the fake word in a tweet] . The President appeared to be complaining about negative press coverage , though he never clarified .
